channel.title: Changing Prices of Items In PkShops & Slayer Shop?[PI]
channel.description: How would I go about changing the price of an item in the pk shops and slayer shop? Yes I'm very stupid... Please help.

item.title: Changing Prices of Items In PkShops & Slayer Shop?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

İn prices.txt , thats where. İt goes as so: #### $$$$
where #### is item id, and $$$$ is price (in any currency, in any shop)

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Prices of Items In PkShops & Slayer Shop?[PI]
